title: M24: Daily Ops Checklist (Scheduler)
objectives: Send internal notifications from system runs.
teachBackPrompt: Explain what a scheduler workflow is and why it is different from contact-triggered automations.

hints.text: Use the Schedule trigger (system run) instead of a contact trigger.
Ensure the test run outputs systemTasksCreated and systemNotifications.

acceptableVariants: Add a webhook send to an external list-builder service.
commonMistakes: Trying to send SMS or email without a contact context.
Scheduler module not supported by test run engine.
